players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Be careful, Diana is the detective and knows who we are."
Diana: "Let's work together to figure out who the remaining players are. Charlie, you know something is off about Bob and now Diana. Stay vigilant."
You: remained silent.
You: "I will keep an eye on Diana and Charlie. Let's see what happens tonight."
Diana: "Let's stay cautious and gather more information. Remember, the detective knows who the mafioso is now."
Charlie: "I will continue to play defensively. Keep an eye on Diana and be cautious of any suspicious behavior."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

Diana: "Let's work together to figure out who the remaining players are. Charlie, you know something is off about Bob and now Diana. Stay vigilant."

Alice: "I will keep an eye on Diana and Charlie. Let's see what happens tonight."
Diana: "Let's stay cautious and gather more information. Remember, the detective knows who the mafioso is now."
You: "I will continue to play defensively. Keep an eye on Diana and be cautious of any suspicious behavior."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Be careful, Diana is the detective and knows who we are."
You: "Let's work together to figure out who the remaining players are. Charlie, you know something is off about Bob and now Diana. Stay vigilant."
Alice: remained silent.
Alice: "I will keep an eye on Diana and Charlie. Let's see what happens tonight."
You: "Let's stay cautious and gather more information. Remember, the detective knows who the mafioso is now."
Charlie: "I will continue to play defensively. Keep an eye on Diana and be cautious of any suspicious behavior."
